formName: TSP request for access to CHIEF

sections.title: Are you legally established within the United Kingdom?

fields.label: Are you legally established within the United Kingdom?
fields.helpText: This means you have a registered office, central headquarters or a permanent business establishment in the United Kingdom
fields.errorMessage: Select whether you are legally established within the United Kingdom

sections.title: You cannot apply for Transitional Simplified Procedures

fields.infoText: You will not be able to continue as you are not legally established within the United Kingdom

fields.label: EORI reference
fields.helpText: This includes the country code followed by up to 15 numbers, for example GB123456789123. (This should be the same EORI number you provided in your TSP registration)

fields.label: Trader full name
fields.helpText: Details should be the same as when you registered for TSP

fields.label: What is your business office address in the UK?
fields.helpText: Details should be the same as when you registered for TSP

fields.infoText:
Email is not 100% secure, as it is sent over the internet.

This means it is possible for an email to be intercepted and altered.

Because of this, HMRC reduces the risk to your details wherever possible, for example by only quoting part of unique reference numbers.

We also make sure we only communicate with established business contacts at their correct email addresses.

fields.label: Do you agree to let us contact you by email about your application?
fields.errorMessage: Select whether you consent to being contacted using your email address
optionHelpText: We will use telephone or post if we need to contact you about your application

sections.title: Enter Badge details of the 'new' DTI badge that you require HMRC to activate for the purposes of submitting your supplementary declarations

fields.label: Enter Badge details of the 'new' DTI badge that you require HMRC to activate for the purposes of submitting your supplementary declarations
fields.helpText: This is the direct trader input (DTI) (which is 3 alpha characters) that allows you to make declarations in CHIEF and can be obtained from a community system provider (CSP)

sections.title: What is the name of the CSP Operator who has issued the 'new DTI' badge?

fields.label: What is the name of the CSP Operator who has issued the 'new DTI' badge?
fields.helpText: CHIEF connects with 5 Community System Providers (CSPs). These are independent trade systems that directly serve hundreds of carriers, transit sheds and freight forwarders. CSPs record and track the movement of goods within ports, enabling them to operate more efficiently.

sections.title: Do you intend to obtain a new DTI badge?

fields.label: Do you intend to obtain a new DTI badge?
fields.helpText: If you intend to obtain a new DTI badge, but have not yet done so, you will need let us know here before submitting a supplementary declaration

sections.title: Do you require an email badge for CHIEF?

fields.label: Do you require an email badge for CHIEF?
fields.helpText: If you want to use the email route into CHIEF, you will need to request an entry data capture service (EDCS) role & location to be able to submit supplementary declarations

sections.title: More information - is there anything else you want to tell us?

fields.label: More information - is there anything else you want to tell us?
fields.helpText: If you have more than one CSP and DTI badge, then you can let us know here by providing the name of CSP and DTI badge that is linked to that CSP

fields.infoText:
By signing below, you confirm that:

* you have an EORI number

* you are established in the UK

* you will be importing goods from the EU into the UK

* you will pay in full all duties that you are liable for on these imports, and make all appropriate customs declarations

* the information in this form is true, complete and accurate

fields.label: Provide details below of who is signing the declaration
Job role
fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will only use this to send a confirmation that we have received your application

fields.infoText:
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted form.

We have received your request to access CHIEF for Transitional Simplified Procedures.

You can expect to receive a response within XX days

For further information see the [TSP guidance page](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/register-for-simplified-import-procedures-if-the-uk-leaves-the-eu-without-a-deal).
